data.text: I wish I could give this stay a full 5 stars. I'm not one to give negative reviews but feel like I need to in this case. We stayed in this hotel 3 nights, and could barely sleep the last 2 because of no air conditioning. The weather was 80 degrees fahrenheit in the city at the time. We called to get this resolved and was told that management had the A/C on "winter mode" which doesn't get transitioned to "summer mode" until April 1st. We had the lack of a working A/C on 3/30 and 3/31 evenings. We addressed this by opening windows, which again, was not ideal because we're located in a busy part of the city, and to make matters worse, 3/31 was an election night so there was a lot of fanfare and chants happening outside.  Bottom line, if you're paying good money for a global brand you at a minimum would expect decent HVAC support.  Staff didn't suggest any alternatives (i.e. providing a fan).  Otherwise the stay was great - you cannot beat the location, room was excellent (we stayed at a suite) and the breakfast food was delicious. Just make sure when the whether is warm, you're there on April or later.
data.title: Wonderful hotel, but we couldn't sleep because of managmeeent decision to limit A/C availability

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear  Inspiration299053  

Thank you very much for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. 
Our guest’s feedbacks are very important for us and we apologize for the inconvenience caused during your recent visit. 
But we kindly would like state that ,the air conditioning units in hotels & high-rise buildings cannot be both cold and hot mode at the same time. Also our team members explained you the process during your stay.
According to quick seasonal weather changes in İzmir region , some of our guests want cold in the day time, while others want warm weather from air condition in the evening time. 
Recently the temperature is 22-27 degrees during the day but it is 7-9 degrees in the evenings last weeks.  There are almost 15 degrees difference between day and evening.

However, we would like to point out that we already switch our air conditioners to cold mode as of April 1 like every year according to majority of guest needs and more stable weather conditions.

Nevertheless, we will use your feedback to fine-tune our operation in the hope that upon your next visit, we can meet or exceed your expectations.

Best Regards

Hotel management
owner_response.author: HOTEL MANAGEMENT

data.text:
Came here for a short stay , my partner had some work so I came along for a few days 
Hotel is lovely and staff are so helpful ,rooms are lovely and spacious and spotless clean 
Plenty of food choice and breakfast was lovely wouud definitely recommend and stay here again.
data.title: Fab hotel

Dear  NorthwichEllie 
	
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback from your visit to Park Inn by Radisson Izmir.
		
We are delighted to read from your review that you enjoyed your recent stay with us and we also appreciate you pointing out the excellent service you received from our ambassadors.
  
It is always a pleasure to have you as our guest and on behalf of all the ambassadors at Park Inn by Radisson Izmir, I look forward to welcoming you back.

Sincerely, 
Eray Guney

Park Inn by Radisson Izmir
owner_response.author: HOTEL MANAGEMENT

data.text:
Very good location on the city map.
In addition to completing and fulfilling the customer requirements, all of the staff is professional and very helpful, special thanks to Sude and Berkan from the restaurant.
Everyday room cleaning makes staying more enjoyable. Excellent ratio of quality price and conditions ensured, recommend Radisson Izmir as a place to be chosen for any travel purpose to Izmir.
data.title: Recommended by, excellent location, qualified and skilled staff,  clean and price-quality ratio.

data.text: If you ever wont to visit Izmir Radission Park inn the place to be. From front desk to breakfast on top people there to look after you. They are efficient and very helpful. Location is brilliant close to city centre, restaurant and seaside.
data.title: Lovingly nice

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear gemg2013,

I would like to thank you for staying with us at Park Inn by Radisson İzmir during your recent visit and for taking time to send us your valuable comments.

It is indeed a great pleasure to learn that you have enjoyed your stay with us and that our services have been satisfactory.

Your feedback is extremely valuable to us as it helps us improve the quality of our service to better meet your needs.

I hope your travels will bring you back to İzmir again soon and it will be our pleasure to welcome you again as our guest.

Kind Regards,

Hotel Management

Park Inn by Radisson İzmir
owner_response.author: HOTEL MANAGEMENT

data.text: We stayed all family at Park Inn we order of 3 rooms and suite, all the rooms are very clean and comfortable, bottles of water replaced every day, reception,  room cleaning and bell  staffs were gorgeous. The breakfast on the roof of the hotel should be richer, with smoked fish and pastries. The staff at the hotel make your stay in Izmir much better, Highly recommended!!
data.title: In the center of Izmir with excellent staff.
